definition: to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

sentences.english: This habit also robbed me of a chance of making easy money.
sentences.chinese: 嚴守時刻的習慣還剝奪我掙容易錢的機會。

sentences.english: I promised Sarah that I was going to keep it a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我答應Sarah我會嚴守祕密的。

sentences.english: Our leader enjoined on us the neccessity for strict secrecy.
sentences.chinese: 我們的領導要我們務必嚴守機密。

sentences.english: One should strictly obey the fourteen basic precepts and possess wisdom and compassion.
sentences.chinese: 嚴守密乘十四條根本戒，具足智慧與大悲力。

sentences.english: Pacta sunt servanda is one of the basic principias in contract law.
sentences.chinese: “合同必須嚴守”是合同法的基本原理。

sentences.english: Are you disciplined enough to succeed in trading?
sentences.chinese: 在交易中你做到了嚴守紀律嗎？

sentences.english: The chairman warned the senator to toe the party line while running for governer.
sentences.chinese: 主席告誡議員們在競選州長時要嚴守該黨的路線。

sentences.english: So left-home people, wherever they may be, must sternly guard their precepts.
sentences.chinese: 所以，出家人處處要嚴守戒律。

sentences.english: Hard work and discipline could lead to self-improvement.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥和嚴守紀律是改善自我的途徑。

sentences.english: Both sides held on to their positions along the outskirts of the towns of Brega and Ajdabiya.
sentences.chinese: 雙方都嚴守住各自在佈雷加和埃賈比耶郊外的陣地。

sentences.english: Strictly abide by the foreign affairs discipline, and adherence to the Party and state secrets.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格遵守外事工作紀律，嚴守黨和國家的祕密。

sentences.english: The housecarls around Harold preserved their discipline.
sentences.chinese: 哈羅德身邊的臣僕仍嚴守紀律。

sentences.english: Then enjoining him to keep it strictly confidential, he told him the whole story.
sentences.chinese: 叮囑他嚴守祕密，然後把這事講出來。

sentences.english: But Cao Gui persuaded Lu Zhuang Gong just to keep up with a good defense.
sentences.chinese: 但曹劌說服魯莊公只需嚴守防線。

sentences.english: She was the most close-mouthed female in the white House - and she had to be.
sentences.chinese: 她是白宮最嚴守祕密的女人，她必須這樣。
